markdownRemark.html:
Build a blog with Gatsby for 5H 45 mins.

Wow.. super tired… It’s almost took 5h 45mins. So tired.

But I am not sure this blog can be monetize-able. Just alternatively chosen Gatsby as wanted to practice my coding.

I know Doing code writing is not the sub-job. That is quite energy consuming. Not easy to work with another creating.

Did it valuable?

I don’t know, but I can add monetization section in this blog. Thus This blog has some perks from it.

And I want to use this blog as a center of my influences by bridging all other Social Network Platforms of mine.

Then I’ll shows it up through this blog about my result and improvements every single day.

I know already a tons of times made-and-erased other blogs. But since I started Meditation and Yoga every morning, I can feel more sharply managing myself in better quality.

So, Long term keeping this blog would be no problem.

I want to grow up my capacity to earn by remote working.

However, I want to see it as a long journey. Obviously I need to improve my all skills, even though someone claims about it ‘Why don’t you follow 20:80 principle?‘.

I want to follow 20:80 rules, however, Life isn’t sure to be stay safe in mono-skill.

Video editing, I cannot just settle for secondary methods.

Youtube, It seems already overwhelmingly issued with most of subjects what I want to deal with.

Neuroscience, Stress management, Gain more productivities, etc. Those subjects are already fully charged by Doctors, and other healers. Of course, I must be a veteran with above skills as I need those managements with my brain to be fully functioning.

frontmatter.description: An essay how was that making a monetize-able gatsby blog. To make money isn't an easy way!
frontmatter.title: Blog made by Gatsby in 5H 45 Mins
